product_name: Burton Stiletto EST Snowboard Bindings - Women's - 2012/2013
long_description: The Burton Stiletto EST snowboard bindings provides endless stance adjustability and enhanced board feel and control. Women-specific True Fit(TM) Design creates boots and bindings specifically for the way a woman rides, ensuring complete control, total power and ultimate fun. Ergonomically-canted, cored highbacks eliminate hardware to save weight; forward lean and highback rotation adjust independently of each other for a precise fit. Highbacks rotate side to side to follow the natural contours of your calves, optimizing power and comfort; forward lean adjusts quickly and easily without a tool. Highbacks feature over-the-top padding for extra cushioning that won't bite your calf. Lush ankle straps and premium toe straps lock you into the bindings; precurved and padded, they feature telescoping and multilocation adjustability. Primo capstrap toe straps feature a 3D, curved fit; built-in grip keeps straps in place. Tool-free telescoping straps adjust in seconds. Stilletto bindings feature smooth-gliding buckles that close and release quickly, are easy to grab and provide many seasons of premium ratcheting power. Single-component, lightweight-yet-tough, composite baseplates provide moderate flex and consistent response for a versatile ride on all terrain. Removable ShredBED(TM) 2.0 footbed system protects against impacts while still allowing great board feel; stance indicator window allows easy mounting and adjustment. 2012 Stilleto EST bindings will fit 2011 through 2013 Channel Boards with the included black hardware.
